|flash1type = CMOS |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = PMC;Pm39LV040-70VCE; |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = NAND |fla2chip = Samsung;K9F1208UOC-PCB0; |flash2size = 64 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T51163QG-HCE6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, JP2 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N:DA0JN3MB4D0" and "Rev:D" are silkscreened on the main board.
"P/N:DA0JN3TH4B0" and "Rev:C"are silkscreened on the SD/CF board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F5182 ARM5 (@400MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR *Storage: 512KiB CMOS Flash, 64MB NAND Flash, 2x SATA *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:NMH410 01.jpg| File:NMH410 02.jpg| File:NMH410 03.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Linksys NMH410 Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:Linksys NMH410 Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:Linksys NMH410 Card Reader Top.jpeg|Card Reader Board Top File:Linksys NMH410 Card Reader Bottom.jpeg|Card Reader Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
